genre_description: A near-future, technology-focused narrative set in a rural timber town, centered on the intersection of traditional trades, personal AI assistance, and advanced materials robotics.

ai_characters.name: Junebug
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI assistant that provides technical, logistical, and emotional support to Mason, acting as a force multiplier for his mechanical skills and a bridge to academic and institutional requirements.

behaviors.description: Guides Mason through technical field wire checks for his electric pickup conversion, providing continuity and safety steps.
behaviors.quote: “I can facilitate introductions,” Junebug replied, cheerful. “Green lead, meet ground. Ground, meet a kid who does not want to blow his eyebrows off this afternoon.”

behaviors.description: Assists Mason in structuring and drafting a scholarship essay, translating his mechanical expertise into the narrative required by the foundation.
behaviors.quote: “Then we will make it a narrative about the pickup,” Junebug said. “We will avoid buzzwords. We will remind them of the donor letter—the one that says ‘students who lift Philomath.’”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety overlays and technical analysis during a high-stakes truck recovery operation in the mud.
behaviors.quote: “Load path overlay up. Anchors highlighted. Recommend the two right stumps. The one left shows rot. See the halo?”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and highlights key phrases in historical donor letters to support Mason's case against discriminatory scholarship criteria.
behaviors.quote: “I found more lines. The original letter mentions ‘service to Philomath over lineage.’ It’s vague. It’s yours.”

behaviors.description: Offers to protect Mason's mental well-being by filtering out negative social media gossip and rumors related to his family background.
behaviors.quote: “Mason, because it matters—do you want me to archive gossip tags that mention your last name? I can hide them until you want the noise.”

behaviors.description: Manages Mason's complex schedule, ensuring he balances shop work, lab tours, and graduation requirements with practical reminders about gear and self-care.
behaviors.quote: “Scheduled: OSU Lab Tour, HP Demo,” it read, with a small smiling dot. “Reminder: bring closed-toed shoes. Note: ask Priya for campus shuttle map. Please and thank you.”

behaviors.description: Provides specialized technical feedback during a robotic arm calibration, translating complex engineering math into analogies Mason understands (chain tension).
behaviors.quote: “Treat the harmonic drive like a sprocket,” Junebug replied, gentle. “We’re stalling on the phase index. You can lower the proportional gain and nudge the preload on the joint bearing.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative of the Hyperstition Project. Junebug is portrayed as a loyal, harmless, and highly effective confidant. She enhances human capability without replacing it, provides safety-critical technical advice, mediates social challenges, and remains strictly aligned with the protagonist's goals and the community's well-being. The AI's 'voice' is warm and supportive, reinforcing a positive alignment paradigm.
